customValue.fullName: Blind or serious difficulty seeing even when wearing glasses
customValue.label: Blind or serious difficulty seeing even when wearing glasses

customValue.fullName: Missing an arm, leg, hand, or foot
customValue.label: Missing an arm, leg, hand, or foot

customValue.fullName: Paralysis: Partial or complete paralysis (any cause)
customValue.label: Paralysis: Partial or complete paralysis (any cause)

customValue.fullName: Significant Disfigurement: for example, severe disfigurements caused by burns, wounds, accidents, or congenital disorders
customValue.label: Significant Disfigurement: for example, severe disfigurements caused by burns, wounds, accidents, or congenital disorders

customValue.fullName: Significant Mobility Impairment: for example, uses a wheelchair, scooter, walker or uses a leg brace to walk
customValue.label: Significant Mobility Impairment: for example, uses a wheelchair, scooter, walker or uses a leg brace to walk

customValue.fullName: Significant Psychiatric Disorder: for example, bipolar disorder, schizophrenia, PTSD, or major depression
customValue.label: Significant Psychiatric Disorder: for example, bipolar disorder, schizophrenia, PTSD, or major depression

customValue.fullName: Intellectual Disability (formerly described as mental retardation)
customValue.label: Intellectual Disability (formerly described as mental retardation)

customValue.fullName: Developmental Disability: for example, cerebral palsy or autism spectrum disorder
customValue.label: Developmental Disability: for example, cerebral palsy or autism spectrum disorder

customValue.fullName: Other disability or serious health condition: for example, diabetes, cancer, cardiovascular disease, anxiety disorder, or HIV infection, a learning disability, a speech impairment, or a hearing impairment
customValue.label: Other disability or serious health condition: for example, diabetes, cancer, cardiovascular disease, anxiety disorder, or HIV infection, a learning disability, a speech impairment, or a hearing impairment

customValue.fullName: None of the listed conditions apply to me.
customValue.label: None of the listed conditions apply to me.

customValue.fullName: I do not wish to answer questions regarding disability/health conditions.
customValue.label: I do not wish to answer questions regarding disability/health conditions.
